signatures.desc: Uses this string as a format string and returns a string obtained by substituting the specified arguments, using the default locale.

signatures.text: fun String.Companion.format( format: String, vararg args: Any?): String
signatures.desc: Uses the provided format as a format string and returns a string obtained by substituting the specified arguments, using the default locale.

signatures.text: @DeprecatedSinceKotlin("1.4") fun String.format( locale: Locale, vararg args: Any?): String
signatures.desc: Uses this string as a format string and returns a string obtained by substituting the specified arguments, using the specified locale.

signatures.text: @JvmName("formatNullable") fun String.format( locale: Locale?, vararg args: Any?): String
signatures.desc: Uses this string as a format string and returns a string obtained by substituting the specified arguments, using the specified locale. If locale is null then no localization is applied.

signatures.text: @DeprecatedSinceKotlin("1.4") fun String.Companion.format( locale: Locale, format: String, vararg args: Any?): String

signatures.text: @JvmName("formatNullable") fun String.Companion.format( locale: Locale?, format: String, vararg args: Any?): String
signatures.desc: Uses the provided format as a format string and returns a string obtained by substituting the specified arguments, using the specified locale. If locale is null then no localization is applied.
